meanings.definition: To perform the first part of an action.
meanings.sent1: We should begin by gathering all the necessary materials.
meanings.sent2: He will begin the presentation with an interesting fact.
meanings.sent3: The chef began to cook the meal by chopping the vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The team began their project with a brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: The story began with a mysterious knock on the door.
